concept.title: Multileader
concept.shortdesc: Multileader is usually composed of four-part, arrowhead, leader, leader landing, and content. Each multileader can contain more than one leader line, and each leader line can be composed of one or more segments. Leader content can be set to Mtext or block. That is, a note created by multileader can point to more than one part of the drawing.

conbody.p: You can create a multileader by Arrowhead First or Content First. The Multileader Style Manager is also provided for style managing. You can create different styles of multi-leaders in the same view by setting multileader style.
